divs: Sighting Detailsabout a mounth ago we had a snow flerry all morning until about noon i was going to a friends house totake him car shopping just left my subdivision and notised one front pushing another front out with a clear sky area in between the sun was in the edge of the oncoming front covered by clouds and the sun rays were beautiful so i decited to try to take a pic i pulled my car over and snaped a shot then saw the objcoming through the clouds and snaped second shot the obj left tracks in the clouds i have pic on phone i was going to take more but my phone rang and it vanished before i could get back to pic it just disolved into thin air
